mysticalRev.name: Mystical Revolution

chaoticRev.name: Chaotic Revolution
chaoticRev.descriptionCZ: Jediný limit je vaše fantazie. Je tu vše od technologie do magie.
chaoticRev.descriptionEN: The only limit is your imagination. There's everything from technology to magic here.
